Northland doctors say scrapping smokefree legislation ‘ridiculous’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-doctors-say-scrapping-smokefree-legislation-ridiculous/MBQE2HK2YFEN5O3BAL7CMHKDSE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-doctors-say-scrapping-smokefree-legislation-ridiculous/MBQE2HK2YFEN5O3BAL7CMHKDSE/ In a few days, the open letter had got the support of nearly 20 emergency doctors.
